# Pranjal Poudel - Portfolio Website

## Overview
This is the personal portfolio website of Pranjal Poudel, an Electronic Engineer and Web Developer. It showcases his skills, education, projects, and contact information.

## Tech Stack
- **Frontend**: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (Vanilla ES6+)
- **Hosting**: GitHub Pages
- **Integrations**: EmailJS (Contact Form), Google Analytics
- **Design logic**: Single Page Application (SPA) feel with smooth scrolling anchors.

## Key Sections
- **Home**: Hero section with introduction.
- **About**: Professional summary and background.
- **Education**: Timeline of academic journey.
- **Skills**: Grid of technical skills (Hardware & Software).
- **Hobbies**: Personal interests.
- **Contact**: Functional contact form and social links.

## Contact
- **Email**: pranjalpaudel62@gmail.com
- **GitHub**: https://github.com/Pranjalpoudel
